text:
Expliquer la source d'inspiration pour le choix de vos études/métier (une personne ou situation qui vous a inspiré)
 At first my studies intentions were far away from my acuals ones. at the end of middle school, I decided to go on a watchmaking fomation.
It was a CAP so the actuals level of classes were pretty low despite the fact that watchmaking is highly interesting.
That's why at the end of my first year, I decided to go on a general highschool. after three years I passed my final test, the baccalaureat. I wanted
to go on a architecture cshool but unfortunately I have been refused.
As you can see i did not really been inspired by someone or something. I chose communication and information sciences because they seem
 interesting to me. There is a lot to learn and discover, and even if i'm not finishing this license it seems very exciting for me.
the subjects that we are morking in are linked with the comtemporarian life. It gives us keys to understand well the worl around us.
University is also an other way of thinking. It allows you to think by yourself, it encourage us to show ourself critical from what we learn.i'
cotrarly to all I've seen this long in matter of teching university is unique. I have to build my lessons by myself based on whats the professor
teach us and on what i learn by myself.
I think all this aspects of the university attrayed me more than a specifical goal like a job.
